description: ProjectMember represents an user or group who is a member of a project

^(created_at)$.description: Timestamp when the project membership was created

^(latest_project_version_id)$.description: The ID of latest project version this member is associated with

^(parent_id)$.description: Optional parent ID for nested project memberships

^(updated_at)$.description: Timestamp when the project membership was last modified

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the project membership was created

group.description: The group who is a member of the project

latestProjectVersionId.description: The ID of latest project version this member is associated with

parentId.description: Optional parent ID for nested project memberships

role.description: The role of the user in the project

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the project membership was last modified

user.description: The user who is a member of the project

title: Project Member
